price: 我确已用荒年和歉收去惩治法老的臣民，以便他们觉悟。
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaqad akhadhnā āla fir'ʿawna bil-sinīna wanaqṣin mina al-thamarāti laʿallahum yadhakkarūna
